mapper.insert:
insert into SYS_ROBOT_PARTS_MANAGEMENT
PARTS_MANAGEMENT_ID,
ACCESSORIES_TYPE,
FAULT_NAME,
ACCESSORIES_CODE,
ACCESSORY_NAME,
ACCESSORY_MODEL,
UNIT,
ACCESSORY_PRICE,
ACCESSORY_PRICE_OUT,
WARRANTY_PERIOD,
APPLICABLE_MODELS,
REMARKS,
CREATE_TIME,
UPDATE_TIME,
ACCESSORIES_TYPE_ID,
BRAND,
PROCUREMENT_CHANNELS,
#{partsManagementId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{accessoriesType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{faultName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{accessoriesCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{accessoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{accessoryModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update SYS_ROBOT_PARTS_MANAGEMENT
ACCESSORIES_TYPE = #{accessoriesType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAULT_NAME = #{faultName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCESSORY_NAME = #{accessoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCESSORY_MODEL = #{accessoryModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCESSORY_PRICE = #{accessoryPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCESSORY_PRICE_OUT = #{accessoryPriceOut,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WARRANTY_PERIOD = #{warrantyPeriod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLICABLE_MODELS = #{applicableModels,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCESSORIES_CODE = #{accessoriesCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=CHAR},
ACCESSORIES_TYPE_ID = #{accessoriesTypeId,jdbcType = BIGINT},
BRAND = #{brand,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
PROCUREMENT_CHANNELS = #{procurementChannels,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
where PARTS_MANAGEMENT_ID = #{partsManagementId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update SYS_ROBOT_PARTS_MANAGEMENT set ACCESSORIES_TYPE = #{accessoriesType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAULT_NAME = #{faultName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCESSORY_NAME = #{accessoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCESSORY_MODEL = #{accessoryModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCESSORY_PRICE = #{accessoryPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WARRANTY_PERIOD = #{warrantyPeriod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLICABLE_MODELS = #{applicableModels,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=CHAR} where PARTS_MANAGEMENT_ID = #{partsManagementId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select srpm.*, srpmt.PARTS_MANAGEMENT_TYPE as accessoriesTypeName from SYS_ROBOT_PARTS_MANAGEMENT srpm left join SYS_ROBOT_PARTS_MANAGEMENT_TYPE srpmt on srpm.ACCESSORIES_TYPE_ID = srpmt.ID
AND ACCESSORIES_TYPE_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{accessoriesTypeId},'%')
AND FAULT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{faultName},'%')
AND ACCESSORY_MODEL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{accessoryModel},'%')
AND ACCESSORY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{accessoryName},'%')
ORDER BY srpmt.PARTS_MANAGEMENT_TYPE DESC, srpm.ACCESSORIES_CODE

SELECT srpm.PARTS_MANAGEMENT_ID, srpm.ACCESSORIES_TYPE, srpm.FAULT_NAME, srpm.ACCESSORY_NAME, srpm.ACCESSORY_MODEL, srpm.ACCESSORY_PRICE, srpm.WARRANTY_PERIOD, srpm.APPLICABLE_MODELS, srpm.REMARKS, srpm.CREATE_TIME, srpm.UPDATE_TIME, srpm.ACCESSORY_PRICE_OUT, srpm.UNIT, srpm.ACCESSORIES_CODE , sgs.AMOUNT, sgs.SPOT_ID
FROM SYS_ROBOT_PARTS_MANAGEMENT srpm LEFT JOIN SYS_GOODS_STOCK sgs ON sgs.MANAGEMENT_ID = srpm.PARTS_MANAGEMENT_ID
AND srpm.ACCESSORIES_TYPE_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{accessoriesType},'%')
AND srpm.ACCESSORY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{accessoryName},'%')
AND sgs.SPOT_ID =#{spotId}
ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT A.PARTS_MANAGEMENT_ID, A.ACCESSORIES_TYPE, A.FAULT_NAME, A.ACCESSORY_NAME, A.ACCESSORY_MODEL, A.ACCESSORY_PRICE, A.WARRANTY_PERIOD, A.APPLICABLE_MODELS, A.REMARKS, A.CREATE_TIME, A.UPDATE_TIME FROM SYS_ROBOT_ERROR_PARTS as B LEFT JOIN SYS_ROBOT_PARTS_MANAGEMENT as A on B.PARTS_MANAGEMENT_ID = A.PARTS_MANAGEMENT_ID WHERE B.ERROR_RECORDS_ID = #{errorRecordsId}
